definition: to live alone/to live a solitary existence
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms

sentences.english: Somebody who lives by himself goes to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 某個獨居的人晚上睡着了。

sentences.english: His job consists of helping old people who live alone.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作包括幫助無人照顧的獨居老人。

sentences.english: Black widows are solitary year-round except during this violent mating ritual.
sentences.chinese: 黑寡婦除了這一兇暴的交配過程以外終年獨居。

sentences.english: Swift and stealthy, adult leopard seals tend to be solitary creatures.
sentences.chinese: 成年海豹是獨居動物，行動敏捷且神祕。

sentences.english: Then he gave up everything to remain a recluse practitioner.
sentences.chinese: 於是一介布衣，潛心在山林中獨居修行。

sentences.english: And when we were come to Rome, Paul was suffered to dwell by himself, with a soldier that kept him.
sentences.chinese: 我們進了羅馬，保祿獲准與看守他的士兵獨居一處。

sentences.english: I am not allowed to sit like a dandelion on my own stem.
sentences.chinese: 我不被允許像一隻獨居枝頭的薄公英那樣閒坐。

sentences.english: They like the isolation out in the wild for this is how they propagate.
sentences.chinese: 他們喜歡獨居在野外，也以這樣的方式繁衍着後代。

sentences.english: Tokiwadaira has become a cheap place for old people who live alone.
sentences.chinese: 常盤平團地已經變成一個讓老人獨居的便宜地方。

sentences.english: I drop in on that poor old lady who lives in a house alone.
sentences.chinese: 我順便去看看那個可憐的獨居的老太太。

sentences.english: They generally live singly in crevices or in burrows under rocks.
sentences.chinese: 通常獨居在岩石裂縫或巖洞中。

sentences.english: In addition, the paired mice suffered much less brain damage than did the surviving solitary mice.
sentences.chinese: 此外，同居小鼠比尚存的獨居小鼠腦損傷小得多。

sentences.english: Some solitary bees make their nests in burrows in the soil.
sentences.chinese: 一些獨居蜂會把巢築在田間的地洞裏。

sentences.english: Daniel, during the breeding season, the red-crested cranes live solitarily .
sentences.chinese: 大牛，丹頂鶴在繁殖的時候啊是要獨居的。

sentences.english: A soft silvery metallic element a rare earth of the lanthanide series it occurs in gadolinite monazite xenotime.
sentences.chinese: 一種軟銀色稀土屬金屬元素見於硅鈹釔獨居石磷釔中。

sentences.english: Then everything just started up again. Normaden was moved out, and Andy was living in solitary splendour again.
sentences.chinese: 諾曼登搬出去後，安迪又再度享受到獨居的優惠。

definition: to call oneself/to claim to be/to profess/to claim a title
